output_list.description: mintToken function allows attackers to increase the total supply of the token arbitrarily, aka 'token Devalue' issue.
freezeAccount function allows attackers to freeze accounts, aka 'Account Freezing' issue.
setPrices function allows attackers to set arbitrary sell and buy prices, aka 'Bad Randomness' issue.
buy function allows attackers to buy tokens for any amount, causing an integer overflow, aka 'Integer Overflow' issue.
sell function allows attackers to sell tokens for any amount, causing an integer overflow, aka 'Integer Overflow' issue.
